ai-patthana8.12:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.12:1.1_0: Experiential confidence in the world, there is no cause or condition for the sake of the world.
ai-patthana8.12:1.1_1: Not looking on at the world, no conditions for the sake of worlds,
ai-patthana8.12:1.1_2: There is no dependent on the world, and there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.12:2.1_0: One does not give rise to the supreme supermundane state with the supermundane conditions.
ai-patthana8.12:3.1_0: The supermundane state doesn’t give rise to the supermundane conditions. Consciousness is a cause of reason.
